mapper.insert: insert into t_trade (id, account, level1, level2, level3, state, out_id, in_id, amount, create_time, description, creator, version) values (#{id}, #{account}, #{level1}, #{level2}, #{level3}, #{state}, #{outId}, #{inId}, #{amount}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{creator}, #{version})
mapper.select: select id, account, level1, level2, level3, state, out_id, in_id, amount, create_time, description, creator, version from t_trade where id = #{id}
